detail_desc: Top in washed linen with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, and buttons down the front.

Shirts in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirts in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Pyjamas with a top and short shorts in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with a round neckline and long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked edges at the hems.

Pyjamas with a top and short shorts in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with a round neckline and long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked edges at the hems.

Lightweight nylon jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar layered with a woven collar and press-stud over the top. Zip down the front, adjustable fastening at the cuffs, zipped front pockets and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Lined.
Sunglasses with glittery plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Cold shoulder blouse in airy chiffon with narrow shoulder straps, and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with elastication at the shoulders. Partly lined in jersey.

Ankle-length cargo trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and flap leg pockets with a button.

Knee-length shirt dress woven in a wool blend with a collar, V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Calf-length dress in a linen and cotton weave with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined.

Knee-length dress in softly draping satin with an opening and twisted detail at the front of the neckline and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, wide, buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication. Unlined.
Pleated jumpsuit in airy, glittery jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a loose added layer at the top, and straight, wide legs. Lined.
Glittery metal hair clips in various designs. Length approx. 4.5 cm.
Thong briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist and lined gusset. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs with raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey, two ribbed and one with an all-over print. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.

Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with an extra-high waist, pleats at the top and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with an extra-high waist, pleats at the top and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fitted top in airy jersey made from a silk and viscose blend. Round neck and extra-long sleeves.
Leggings in airy jersey made from a silk and viscose blend. High, elasticated waist and raw-edge hems.
Waterproof boots with reflective details. Soft pile linings, fleece insoles and chunky soles.

Sleeveless dress in lightweight cotton canvas with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that join at the back. Buttons down the front, narrow elastication at the top of the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in lightweight cotton canvas with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that join at the back. Buttons down the front, narrow elastication at the top of the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Set in soft, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set in soft, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set in a soft, printed cotton blend. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable buttons, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top in jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Set in a soft, printed cotton blend. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable buttons, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top in jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Metal bangle.
Warm-lined ankle boots with appliqués, a zip at one side and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short pencil skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Short skirt in a textured weave with a high waist, detachable belt and concealed zip and button at one side. Unlined.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Narrow, concealed elastication at the top and covered elastication at the hem. Medium support. The polyester content of the bra’s outer fabric and lining is recycled.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Narrow, concealed elastication at the top and covered elastication at the hem. Medium support. The polyester content of the bra’s outer fabric and lining is recycled.

Jacket in soft, patterned thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves and trims around the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Jacket in soft, patterned thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves and trims around the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Set with a jacket and trousers in soft thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, raglan sleeves and a contrasting colour trim at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist. The polyester content of the set is recycled.

Set with a jacket and trousers in soft thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, raglan sleeves and a contrasting colour trim at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist. The polyester content of the set is recycled.

Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Jumper in a soft knit with an intarsia motif on the front and an appliqué on one sleeve. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in washed linen with a grandad collar and half-length button placket with a classic front. Yoke at the back and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Straight fit with a rounded hem.
